ygData.subject: OT: Druids
ygData.msgSnippet: Druids are way overpowered. Check out this Druid kiting guide.  It tells you exactly how Druids can solo REDs that are 6 levels above them.  Who needs heals
ygData.messageBody:
Druids are way overpowered.

Check out this Druid kiting guide. It tells you exactly how Druids can solo
REDs that are 6 levels above them. Who needs heals when you never get hit?
http://www.shadowtech.net/EQdruids/iuna's.htm

It's true that Druids get their last heal spell at 29 (not 34), but after 29
they get 4 Regeneration spells that help heal themselves and the party.


Wayne



> Yes it's true. Druids get a lot of flak for being
> "overpowered" but that's mostly from people who haven't played
> the class. They get one heal spell every 10 levels. When
> they first get the spell, it can heal about one bubble.
> Within a few levels, it's a half bubble. The last 3-4 levels
> before they get their next heal spell, by the time the druid
> gets the heal spell off the monster has done more damage than
> the spell healed. They are basically useless as healers half
> their lower levels, and all of their higher levels (they get
> their last heal spell at 34ish I think).
